price: el día en que de nada servirán las riquezas ni los hijos,
arabic: يَوۡمَ لَا يَنفَعُ مَالٞ وَلَا بَنُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: yawma lā yanfaʿu mālun walā banūna
